description: This file implements a Todo application using the jsblocks framework, defining models, collections, and views for managing todo items with local storage persistence.

classes.name: Todo
classes.description: Model representing a single todo item with properties for title, completion status, and editing state, including methods for toggling completion, editing, and handling actions.

classes.name: Todos
classes.description: Collection of Todo models with methods for initialization, toggling all, clearing completed, saving to local storage, and updating remaining count.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the Todo model or collection, setting up property change handlers and local storage synchronization.

methods.name: toggleComplete
methods.description: Toggles the completion status of a Todo item.

methods.name: edit
methods.description: Enters editing mode for a Todo item.

methods.name: closeEdit
methods.description: Exits editing mode, deleting the Todo if the title is empty.

methods.name: handleAction
methods.description: Handles key events for editing, specifically Enter and Escape keys.

methods.name: toggleAll
methods.description: Sets all Todo items as completed or active based on current remaining count.

methods.name: clearCompleted
methods.description: Removes all completed Todo items from the collection.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves the current state of the Todo collection to local storage.

methods.name: updateRemaining
methods.description: Updates the observable count of remaining incomplete Todo items.

methods.name: routed
methods.description: Handles route changes to filter Todo items by status.

methods.name: addTodo
methods.description: Adds a new Todo item to the collection if the Enter key is pressed.
